inclusion.criterion: symptomatic patients (NYHA-stadium ≥ III) for at least 3 months with an exploited medical heart insufficiency therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: increased perioperative risk with a logistic EuroScore ≥ 15 or STS-Score ≥ 15
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MR grade ≥ 2, amenable for MitraClip intervention assessed by an experienced interventional cardiologist
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Affirmation of in-operability by a 'Heart-Team' consisting of either 1 cardiac surgeon and 1 cardiologist or 3 cardiologists
inclusion.label: met
